headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Hunter
content: Calling the Hunter an attack helicopter is misleading, because this thing is in a class of its own. Its standard loadout is so heavy you’ll be surprised it can get off the ground. Its unique rocket barrage alone is enough to lay waste to an army of foes, and that’s before you’ve looked at its suite of apocalyptic mod options. If you’re looking to be a one-man armored division, look no further.
